data.name: TROUBLESHOOTER: Abandoned Children - White Lion and Black Witch - Digital Art Book
data.detailed_description:
This DLC is a digital artbook of TROUBLESHOOTER: Abandoned Children - White Lion and Black Witch.

The contents will be provided as PDF file, written in Korean, English, Japanese, and Simplified Chinese.

The artbook is majorly composed of illustrations used in TROUBLESHOOTER: Abandoned Children - White Lion and Black Witch.

  • There are 116 pages in the artbook.
  • There are 10 type wallpaper.
  • File path: (Installation Path)\ArtBook\WLBW\Troubleshooter_AC_WLBW_Artbook_eng.pdf
  • If there are any typos, please let us know, we will fix them right away.

    This digital artbook requires 1.84GB of disk space.
